properties.label: Required
properties.name: required
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Handle time zone
properties.name: withTimeZone
properties.caption:
No: user time zone is ignored. No difference between display/input and value
Yes: display/input reflects the user time zone and may be different from the (UTC) value

properties.label: Value
properties.name: value
properties.help: Read-write binding, initialized or updated by users' input (bi-directional bond)
properties.caption: Any variable: myData or myData.attribute
properties.help: A date that should be at midnight UTC when 'Handle time zone' is not selected
properties.caption: Date object or ISO 8601 formatted String variable

properties.label: Technical date format
properties.name: dateFormat
properties.caption: Use the characters: M (month), d (day), y (year)

properties.label: Date Placeholder
properties.name: placeholder
properties.help: Short hint that describes the expected input format for the date
properties.caption: Includes the localized version of the Technical date format property, to guide the user

properties.label: Technical time format
properties.name: timeFormat
properties.caption: Use the characters: H (hour), h (hour in AM/PM), m (minutes) and optionally s (seconds), a (AM/PM)

properties.label: Time Placeholder
properties.name: timePlaceholder
properties.help: Short hint that describes the expected input format for the time
properties.caption: Includes the localized version of the Technical time format property, to guide the user

properties.label: Show Now button
properties.name: showNow
properties.help: Display or hide the shortcut button to set date and time to now
